name: Witches drinking tea
description:
NOTE:
This is the POST gamejam version, with fixed dialog interaction.

The original gamejam entry is HERE:
*** http://madmarcel.github.io/paljam/ ***
(the dialog does not work)
==============================
My WIP entry for #palettejam - the theme was 'underground'

This is using the 'Earthy' colour palette.

I wanted to make a small prototype game that combined a 360 photo sphere with a visual novel.
Not much game here just yet. Had to write a dialog/animation engine from scratch.

This game should work with a Google Cardboard or Google Daydream, but I've only tested it once.

Built using the panolens.js library
https://pchen66.github.io/Panolens/
